item.description:
Swamp Rocking Mardi Gras Party

CANCELED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! So sorry everyone, I know you were looking forward to this one. Hope you are all surviving the remains of this nightmare storm! I was looking forward to wairing my Mardi Gras Mask! Stay save and dry!

A note from John Cavaliere...

Just when I thought we could shed the Winter Blues!

Forecasters are suggesting icy driving conditions and..more snow ( ! ).

So I'm afraid that we have to cancel tomorrow's soiree. Â We will either postpone--or create a new event altogether, in which case I would love to have your input.

Take care and

My Best,

John

John Cavaliere, our good friend and owner of the lovely Lyric Hall has invited us to a Mardi Gras Party, always a great time!

There is a $15.00 suggested donation to cover the band and a Mardi Gras mask is optional. This is a BYOB event.

Join Steve and the Ringers with the Lyric Hall Horns for a Swamp Rocking Mardi Gras Party. 7 + piece horn section : James Berger,Vance Provey,Keith Yarbrough,Justin Edwards,Nick DiMaria, Steve Asetta..playing as Brass Band and Horn section with The Ringers...


BYOB! Snacks! 7 to?
item.name: Swamp Rocking Mardi Gras Party CANCELED
